Text: I know this may sound fucked up, but here it goes. The Steam Summer Sale is on (I think). Just buy Counter-Strike 1.6 off of Steam. Because Valve owns Steam and made Counter-Strike, they will get all of the money. The more you pirate Valve games, the longer the development takes for another Valve game. I'm not telling you people to stop pirating, I'm just saying to support the developer.
